library:
<class name="raw_pub" type="message_transport::RawPublisher" base_class_type="message_transport::PublisherPlugin">
This is the default publisher. It publishes the objects as-is on the base topic.
<class name="raw_sub" type="message_transport::RawSubscriber" base_class_type="message_transport::SubscriberPlugin">
This is the default pass-through subscriber for topics of type PointCloud
<class name="sharedmem_pub" type="sharedmem_transport::SharedmemPublisherWithHeader" base_class_type="message_transport::PublisherPlugin">
This is the default publisher. It publishes the objects as-is on the base topic.
<class name="sharedmem_sub" type="sharedmem_transport::SharedmemSubscriber" base_class_type="message_transport::SubscriberPlugin">
This is the default pass-through subscriber for topics of type PointCloud
<class name="decimated_pub" type="decimated_transport::DecimatedPublisher" base_class_type="message_transport::PublisherPlugin">
This publisher only published 1/10th of the point cloud data
<class name="decimated_sub" type="decimated_transport::DecimatedSubscriber" base_class_type="message_transport::SubscriberPlugin">
This is the default pass-through subscriber for topics of type PointCloud
